title: Verb family on sale
content:
Just noticed that the Verb family of 18 fonts from Yellow Design Studio is on sale for $9 at mightydeals.com. The same collection is $270 at MyFonts. I've never bought anything at mightydeals but it seems legit.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405051838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/verb_4127.png)
author: JamesM
